TAH_NextTab.description: Focus the next tab, even if it's in a collapsed group.

TAH_PreviousTab.description: Focus the previous tab, even if it's in a collapsed group.

TAH_MoveTabRight.description: Move tab right. Might merge into the next group.

TAH_MoveTabLeft.description: Move tab left. Might merge into the previous group.

TAH_OpenInCurrentGroup.description: Open tab in the current group.
